name: Pac-Man Falling Ghosts
description:
Pac-Man, but the ghosts are falling from the sky. Avoid touching Pinky, Inky, and Clyde (blue, pink, and orange ghosts) or you and Blinky (red ghost) grow. Touching Blinky causes a game over. Every 10 seconds you shrink, but collect a falling pellet to shrink you and Blinky.

Bg music and game over sfx: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
